Sentencas: The advent of 3D printing has ushered in the scope for designing microstructures for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with enhanced power density and lifetime.
Titulo: Design guidelines for the manufacturing of the electrode-electrolyte interface of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Additive manufacturing can introduce structural modifications such as dense electrolyte pillars embedded within the porous electrode domain to facilitate ion transport.
Titulo: Design guidelines for the manufacturing of the electrode-electrolyte interface of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This study presents comprehensive guidelines to the design of electrolyte pillars to minimize the polarization resistance and increase the electrode robustness by means of a numerical model comprising electrochemical phenomena and structural mechanics.
Titulo: Design guidelines for the manufacturing of the electrode-electrolyte interface of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Numerical results show that the introduction of rectangular and trapezoidal pillars can reduce electrode polarization provided that an electrode thickness larger than the active thickness is used.
Titulo: Design guidelines for the manufacturing of the electrode-electrolyte interface of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Lateral fins or any protrusions sticking out the pillar hinder gas transport and should be avoided.
Titulo: Design guidelines for the manufacturing of the electrode-electrolyte interface of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Mechanical stress, up to twice the external compressive load, accumulates at the pillar/electrolyte junction, indicating that sharp corners must be smoothed during pillar manufacturing.
Titulo: Design guidelines for the manufacturing of the electrode-electrolyte interface of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Additional considerations regarding the fabrication accuracy and minimum resolution are addressed too.
Titulo: Design guidelines for the manufacturing of the electrode-electrolyte interface of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Although a simple and general recipe for the optimal electrode fabrication is not possible, the rationale behind the strategies for the best pillar design are presented and critically discussed.
Titulo: Design guidelines for the manufacturing of the electrode-electrolyte interface of solid oxide fuel cells
